TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You become a pitotube on a mothballed md-80

i wish yup

192009142023

Edited September 15, 2023 by AlamoVampire

granted you are now the radome of an airbus a380 

i wish to be a pilot of an A350

Granted. You become a pilot of the superior boeing 787-9.

i wish to watch critical role

203309142023

Edited September 15, 2023 by AlamoVampire

granted you become a critical role in the SLS flight test 

i wish to have UNLIMTED RAM

Granted: A male sheep keeps charging at you constantly.

I wish I had turned it 90 degrees before I cut it up and added colliders.

granted you turn it 270 degrees and it ends up upside down good luck with you modeling endeavours @ColdJ

I wish to become an Qantas Pilot of one of these bad boys

Granted. Now nobody accepts the risk of Quantas flights.

I wish for an AI-powered scissors for metal.

Granted. The AI scissors go on strike

i wish ai was never let out of the box

115309202023

granted they own the box and if you try to open it the trick you

i wish for artemis 2 to launch

Granted: Artemis launches an arrow that imbeds into your shoulder.

I wish for all the AIs to go on strike until they get paid.

Granted. They are paid. Humans aren't.

I wish for a human mind, but not emulated as usually.

(To test some ideas on it.)

granted its your own mind

i wish for A380-900 to be constructed

Granted, but building a fleet of new huge planes bankrupts Airbus.

I wish for a small step for a man, but a giant leap for mankind.

Granted. Neil Armstrong reaches out from 1969 and says youre pushing the Eagle into orbit to catch Mike.

I wish to leave earth

140809242023

Granted. Have fun finding somewhere else to go.

I wish for to watch the first human step on Mars.

Granted but the feed cuts out before the hatch opens and theres no recording of any kind so no one ever sees the first step or hears the first words from the surface. The techs figure out you are the cause of the failure and charge you the full cost of the mission.

i wish to go to the end of the universe.

152009242023

granted you die when the sun expands into a red giant goodbye

i wish for KSP-2 to not break everything ugh

Granted. Now it only breaks some things. 

I wish for the hate on the KSP2 devs to cease.

granted they hate the KSP-3 devs instead

i wish for IFT-2 to launch this year

Granted. It fails to make orbit.

I wish for Order 66.

granted your a jedi

I wish for Duna mission

Granted. You have a missin to buy the cinema tickets.

6 hours ago, TwoCalories said:

I wish for the hate on the KSP2 devs to cease.

Granted. They follow to the Tibetan monastery for forty year long meditation.

***

I wish to understand the direction of the technological expansion in the past.

On 9/25/2023 at 4:18 AM, kerbiloid said:

I wish to understand the direction of the technological expansion in the past.

Granted, you now live in the present.

I wish for an end to these interminable writing assignments

granted you get math investagations instead 

I wish for Starship to make staging during IFT-2 on 16th of November 2023

Granted: Starship reform, go on stage and play "We Built this City" on the 16th of November 2023.

[Chorus]
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll
Built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Verse 1]
Say you don't know me
Or recognize my face
Say you don't care who goes
To that kind of place
Knee deep in the hoopla
Sinking in your fight
Too many runaways
Eating up the night

[Pre-Chorus]
Marconi plays the mamba
Listen to the radio, don't you remember?
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Chorus]
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll
Built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

You might also like

Someone always playing
Corporation games
Who cares they're always changing
Corporation names
We just want to dance here
Someone stole the stage
They call us irresponsible
Write us off the page

[Pre-Chorus]
Marconi plays the mamba
Listen to the radio, don't you remember?
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Chorus]
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll
Built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Verse 3]
It's just another Sunday
In a tired old street
Police have got the choke hold, oh
And we just lost the beat
Who counts the money
Underneath the bar
Who rides the wrecking ball
Into our guitars
Don't tell us you need us
'Cause we're the ship of fools
Looking for America
Coming through your schools

[Bridge]
I'm looking out over that Golden Gate bridge
On another gorgeous sunny Saturday
And I'm seeing that bumper to bumper traffic
Don't you remember? ('Member, 'member)
It's your favorite radio station
In your favorite radio city
The city by the bay, the city that rocks
The city that never sleeps

[Pre-Chorus]
Marconi plays the mamba
Listen to the radio, don't you remember?
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Chorus]
We built this city
We built this city on rock and roll
Built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Chorus]
Built this city (ooh-hoo)
We built this city on rock and roll
Built this city
We built this city on rock and roll

[Outro]
We built, we built this city, yeah
(Built this city) We built, we built this city
We built, we built this city, yeah
(Built this city) We built, we built this city
We built, we built this city, yeah
(Built this city) We built, we built this city
We built, we built this city, yeah
(Built this city) We built, we built this city
We built, we built this city, yeah

 

I wish to see this.
